summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Dashboard Template Library feature. All 14 backend tests passed and all 15 frontend UI tests passed. The feature includes 10 preset templates (Sales, Marketing, Customer, Operations, Finance, Analytics, Executive, Project, Support, Blank), category filtering, tabbed dialog (Preset/My Templates), save dashboard as template, edit and delete custom templates.

backend: Preset templates have all required fields (id, name, description, icon, color, category, is_preset, widgets)
Preset template categories cover expected values (sales, marketing, customers, operations, finance, analytics, executive, project, support, custom)

All 10 preset template names verified (Sales Dashboard, Marketing Analytics, Customer Insights, Operations Monitor, Financial Summary, Web Analytics, Executive Summary, Project Tracker, Support Dashboard, Blank Canvas)
Create dashboard from preset template with widgets
Template widgets preserved when saving from dashboard
All 12 widget types used in presets (stat, chart, table, gauge, progress, map, funnel, heatmap, scorecard, list, timeline, sparkline)
frontend: Category filter dropdown (data-testid='category-filter') works - sales filter shows 1 template
Category filter - marketing filter shows 1 template
My Templates tab (data-testid='custom-tab') shows empty state initially
Click preset template creates dashboard with widgets
Dashboard created from Sales template has 9 widgets
Save as Template button (data-testid='save-as-template-btn') opens modal
Save Template button (data-testid='save-template-submit') saves successfully with toast 'Dashboard saved as template!'
Saved template appears in My Templates tab
Delete template works - toast 'Template deleted' shown, My Templates returns to empty state

critical_code_review_comments: Template Library feature fully implemented with no issues
PRESET_TEMPLATES array in server.py (lines 210-399) contains all 10 preset templates with proper widget configurations
Template API endpoints working correctly: GET /api/templates, POST /api/templates, POST /api/templates/from-dashboard/{id}, PUT /api/templates/{id}, DELETE /api/templates/{id}
Frontend Templates dialog uses tabbed interface (Preset/My Templates) with category filtering for presets
SaveAsTemplateButton component properly integrated in DashboardBuilderPage header
Edit/Delete buttons appear on hover for custom templates
All data-testid attributes properly placed for automated testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Dashboard Template Library feature fully functional. Key test IDs: templates-btn (opens dialog), preset-tab, custom-tab, category-filter (dropdown for preset filtering), template-{id} (template cards), save-as-template-btn (in dashboard header), template-name-input, save-template-submit. 10 preset templates available. User can create custom templates from dashboards, edit names, and delete them. Widget types: stat, chart, table, gauge, progress, map, funnel, heatmap, scorecard, list, timeline, sparkline.

features_verified: Category filter works (all, sales, marketing, etc.)
My Templates tab with empty state
